extension.summary: A customizable Cron timer for XBMC. It can also display notifications when your tasks run.
extension.description: Create cron timers for XBMC functions. This addon can schedule and run any built-in XBMC functions. No more reliance on add-on developers to allow for "timer" functionality, no more scripts running on other machines to send commands to your XBMC HTPC. All of your timers can now be handled directly within XBMC.
